Definitions: maximum decomposition rate of soil organic matter with slow turnover (aka passive pool)
maximum decomposition rate of soil organic matter with intermediate turnover (aka slow pool)
controls flow from soil organic matter with intermediate turnover to CO2 (fraction of C lost as CO2 during decomposition)
controls flow from soil metabolic to CO2 (fraction of C lost as CO2 during decomposition)
slope for the effect of clay on the control for the flow from soil organic matter with fast turnover to SOM with slow turnover (fraction of C from SOM1C to SOM3C)
x location of inflection point used in equation for computing the temperature effect on decomposition
slope of line at inflection point
moisture effect parameter on decomposition (when IDEF = 1)
Tillage Multiplyer on decomposition (som1, som2, and structural pools only) (Maximum Multiplyer i.e. CULT K)
